item.title: R^E^D [possible collab]
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
I think the song, so far, suffers from a lot of repetition. I’ve just reduced the loops to the point where it’s not so boring, which might leave yer a little more time to work on it. During your chorus, get a bit playful and add variations. Go high, go low, ascend and descend. Somethinng to mix it up.

https://app.auxy.co/projects/0tzkJu65lcCTmTE8omCMzQ==
